about_the_game:
About the game

The journey begins in Eden! Explore the remnants of post-apocalyptic civilization and time to define your rules on this new continent! Join a global community for an unforgettable experience. Indulge in a world where chaos meets creativity, empowering every player to contribute to the ever-evolving world of Club Koala!

Features

Indulge in a shared immersive public island that is vibrant with life and unbound mysteries! Join activities and meet players from across the globe! Experience the vibrant community life of Club Koala. Engage in positive social interactions, build connections, forge alliances to create ever lasting memories transcending the boundaries of digital space!

Party Games - A Global Playground

Within Club Koala’s magical world, the excitement never ends! Hang out with your friends and dive into mini games that are beyond excitement and fun! Featuring hundreds of unique maps covering all types of genres you could possibly imagine! Racing, parkour and much more! Challenge players all over the world in awesome competitions to show off your skills and win amazing rewards, all while claiming your throne!

Koala Editor - Unleash Your Creative Genius

Let your creativity shine with the simple Party Game Editor. Creating your own mini-game has never been easier! Imagine, create and share! Challenge your friends and the world in your creation! The only limit is your imagination!

Your Cozy Haven - A Genuine Life Experience

Farm, pick flowers, collect unique fruits and savor in the tranquility of nature. Immersive seasonal events alongside real unique weather changes to provide a genuine cozy atmosphere. Collect various items from mining special ores to picking seashells and much more! Craft 500+ unique pieces of furniture with truly memorable interactions. The forever evolving Club Koala world truly creates an immersive experience. Indulge in a rich selection of fashionable items and shape your world to fit your own unique style.

Interactive Intelligent Villagers - Connect and Discover

Meet awesome and adorable villagers! Humans, animals, and aliens! Each with unique personalities and intelligent evolving responses. Influence their personality, emotions, and memories as they grow along your side. Utilize the intelligent villagers in your own way! Engage and interact and unravel the mysteries of their personalities in a unique forever evolving story! Shape the future, the power is within your hands!

Activities Galore - Plan and Party On

Enjoy unique activities alongside friends and intelligent NPCs such as beach volleyball, sticky ball competitions and much more! Let the good times roll as you outsmart your friends. All while shaping your island into the coolest hangout spot on the planet!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: i5-3570k 3.4 GHz 4 core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 (3GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: i7-9700K 3.6 GHz 8 Core or Above
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: Club Koala is the ultimate home to party games and island construction! Build and experience a world that transcends imagination. Dive into party games and venture across hundreds of maps and challenges, while exploring the opportunities of building your own maps with ease! Play, Create and Explore.
